tool_description: Download audio best quality from YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Shorts in formats: Mp3, M4a, Wma, Aac, Ogg, Opus
name: YouTube Audio
title: YouTube Audio

api_list.name: YouTube Music
api_list.description:
Do some video queries to see how it works. Also take a look at the documentation. You can use our system for large projects, our infrastructure is adapted to this 💪

https://music.youtube.com/watch?v=XXXX
https://youtu.be/XXXX

optional_parameters.name: hl
optional_parameters.description:
en - English [default],
bg - Bulgarian,
cs - Czech,
da - Danish,
de - German,
el - Greek,
es - Spanish,
fi - Finnish,
fr - French,
hr - Croatian,
hu - Hungarian,
it - Italian,

no - Norwegian,
pl - Polish,
pt - Portuguese,
ro - Romanian,
ru - Russian,
sk - Slovak,
sv - Swedish,
uk - Ukrainian
